numbered_ace_sentences: 1. Overall, there seem to be more players of color than white players.
2. Overall, there seem to be more white coaches than coaches of color.
3. Mens basketball is one of five sports leagues.
4. Womens basketball is one of five sports leagues.
5. In mens basketball, the percentage of players of color is the highest among the five sports leagues.
6. In womens basketball, the percentage of players of color is the highest among the five sports leagues.
7. Baseball is one of five sports leagues.
8. In baseball, the number of players of color is the lowest among the five sports leagues.
9. In baseball, the percentage of players of color is about 43% lower than in the league with the highest percentage.
10. I wonder why there are more players of color than non-colored players.
11. I wonder why there are fewer coaches of color than white coaches.
12. I think that the ratios should be closer to each other.
13. If the ratios are closer to each other, then the percentage of people of color in these five sports leagues stays the same for players and coaches.
14. These graphs show an outlier for my community.
15. I have played sports for my whole life.
16. In my experience, there are more white players than players of color in my community.
17. In my experience, there are more white coaches than coaches of color in my community.
18. This fact must arise from the population of my community.
19. Many white people live in my community.
20. Few people of color live in my community.
21. If more people of color live in my community, then there will be more players of color in my community.
22. My community is heavily white.
23. In my community, the number of white players outnumbers the number of players of color.
24. The title of these graphs is "Racial Diversity in Professional Sports".
